name: Crush & Brush Mint Toothpaste Tablets
categories: Toothpaste Tablets Mint in Glass Jar 60g 80 T
description: Keep your teeth feeling smooth and clean, without worrying about squishable tubes of toothpaste or liquids at the airport.Simply chew a tablet and start brushing, the fluoride free ingredients and organic spearmint extract will do the rest.Ingredients: calcium carbonate, sodium bicarbonate, xylitol, potassium bitartrate (cream of tartar), *spearmint flavour, *peppermint flavour, gum arabic, sel marin (sea salt), menthol, magnesium stearate, silica. *organic ingredientFluoride and gluten free.Contains approximately 80 tablets (packaged by weight).Vegan.
